articles.description: Gov. David Ige on Tuesday announced additional easing of COVID-19 mitigation measures for restaurants, bars, gyms and other social establishments.
articles.content:
HONOLULU (KHON2) — Changes are coming for gyms and restaurants starting November 12th that will loosen outdoor dining restrictions. But the Hawaii Restaurant Association said more needs to be done.

articles.author: Katie Canales
articles.title: A startup says it applied to trademark Meta before Facebook - but may be willing to stand down if Mark Zuckerberg pays up - Yahoo News
articles.description: Arizona-based Meta PC told Insider it filed for the "Meta" trademark in August, and Facebook's announcement came as a "shock."
articles.content:
Facebook announced last week that it's changing its name to Meta. But the transition might not be without obstacles.
A company is already after the "Meta" trademark and was well before Facebook roll… [+3105 chars]
